result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Devenire Davon Matlock

records.addlTxt: DNA Notice of Intent to Use_1 - Matlock, Devenire Davon.pdf, Filed.

Defendant Devenire Davon Matlock not in court, in custody.  Attorney Imran Kurter in court for Devenire Davon Matlock.  Prosecuting attorney Chad Wozniak in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Case is scheduled for final pretrial and jury trial in Br 45.  Court advised parties to submit any motions, witness lists/jury instructions 48 hours prior to the date of the final pretrial.  Case remains calendared in Br 45.  mn
Final pre-trial scheduled for November 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Jury trial scheduled for December 12, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Devenire Davon Matlock not in court, in custody.  Attorney Imran Kurter in court for Devenire Davon Matlock.  Attorney Jennifer Tate in court for State of Wisconsin on behalf of Attorney Chad Wozniak. 

Case in court for a scheduling conference.  Defense acknowledges receipt of discovery, but requests an adjourned scheduling conference to allow additional time for review with client.  Court scheduled the matter as requested.  Case adjourned to Branch 45, Rm G55A CJF.
Scheduling conference scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Devenire Davon Matlock in court with Attorney Imran Kurter; both appear by video.  Defendant Devenire Davon Matlock in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Kies, Branch 45. Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pled not guilty. Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference to Branch 45.  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 30, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Imran Kurter in court by video, defendant Devenire Davon Matlock not in court, in custody.  Jennifer Tate appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness was present. Mr Matlock is unavailable due to a medical appointment. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE. Matter is set for status in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Status conference scheduled for August 12, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Devenire Davon Matlock in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Devenire Davon Matlock in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Devenire Davon Matlock appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Yamahiro, Branch 34.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  All parties are notified that effective July 30, 2022, this case will be assigned to Judge Jean Kies, Br 45, room G55 in CJF  Commissioner advised if DNA sample has NOT been obtained from the Defendant Court orders the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department to obtain DNA sample from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4)  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 10, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
